name: Palette (KevS003)
description:
• Fun and engaging  gameplay. 
  • Visually appealing environments inspired by different art styles.
  • Race to collect the golden star at the end as time ticks down, surpass the trials of the deadly maze, and find your way to escape the fractal prison. 

Palette gives the player the opportunity to dive deep into art as they follow Vanta(protagonist) through their travels through artistic environments in order to regain the ability to paint again. Vanta will travel through 3 distinct worlds that allows them to regain the ability to create in that style. Vanta will explore worlds inspired by classical,  graphic novel, and fractal art.  After overcoming the dangers of each world the player will add to their central canvas that tracks their progression throughout the game. 

The player will be equipped with double jump, melee, sprint, and power up abilities. These tools are going to be in use on all levels the player is tasked with exploring.  They will help aid the journey and make the path ahead easier to tackle. Palette offers gorgeous art, an engaging story, and fun gameplay.

Created by:

Tech: Carson

Art: Connor, Kobe, Gage

Programming: Kevin
